intro: In a world where magic is everything, Vib was born with nothing.
All of Wandville knows about Vib and steers clear from him until Gahler, Wandville's highest authority, put a bounty on his head.
Our hero had no other choice... He needed to show everyone that power comes from one's heart, regardless of magic.
To do so, there was only one way: defeat everyone in the Hareena.
wandville: Welcome to Wandville! Remember, you are pretty much the most hated person in here...
hareena: Enter the Hareena! Time to shine!
training: In your hideout you're safe... Unless you are looking to get better at fighting.
